__e: If I were a conservative type I would not be here, sir.
It all happened so fast, and I figured knew.
It wasn't safe, it wasn't fair, and I had to say something.
I mean, does she know how careful she has to be with your secret?
Are--are you saying I need to be cautious Around my own husband?
It's just that I think you should be careful with this guy, that's all.
What if he's too cautious to make a move while we're here?
That you're careful for your sake and for his.
I mean, given our new business relationship, I would think it'd be more prudent of me to lose, but, well, I just don't work that way.
I know to be careful and I know what has to be done.
But I want you to know, if you want it... I know you'll be careful... and I'll be fine.
Whenever I wanted something, I could hear that voice telling me to stop, to be careful, to leave most of my life unlived.
i know you're careful, but it's not worth the risk.
I'd tell you to be careful, but I know that's the last thing you're gonna be.
So you're careful... maybe not careful enough.
